meanings.definition: A place where spices are sold.
meanings.sent1: I visited the spicery to buy some cinnamon for my mom's apple pie.
meanings.sent2: The spicery on the corner always has the freshest herbs and spices.
meanings.sent3: The spicery had a sale, so I bought enough paprika to last a lifetime!
meanings.sent4: The aroma from the spicery wafted through the entire market.
meanings.sent5: The colorful display of spices in the spicery was a feast for the eyes.

meanings.definition: The trade or business of a spice merchant.
meanings.sent1: My uncle's successful spicery has been in the family for generations.
meanings.sent2: Learning the secrets of the spicery trade takes years of apprenticeship.
meanings.sent3: The spicery business can be quite competitive, but my aunt always stays ahead.
meanings.sent4: In the world of flavors, the spicery is the heart of the market.
meanings.sent5: The spicery's reputation for quality and variety attracts customers from far and wide.
